title: Need help to identify this font
content:
Hi  
can someone please help me to identify this font.

Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803031352im_/http:/typophile.com/files/blo1_4368.jpg)
author: logolove

comments.content: Next time post Font ID requests in the section of the forum helpfully labelled " [Font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803031352/http:/typophile.com/typeid)". One can only wonder why you chose not to.

Yes, please ask for (and reply to) ID requests only in the ID section.

hhp
Theunis de Jong , hrant extremely sorry, I will keep that in mind.
